parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS can cause the loss of hydraulic braking, leading to increased stopping distances, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: ABS and brake alarm lights come on and stay on until the engine is shut off
little to no hydraulic braking is available when the brake light is on
prolonged braking in stop-and-go traffic causes the ABS and brake alarm lights to come on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the master cylinder can cause the loss of hydraulic braking, leading to increased stopping distances, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: ABS and brake alarm lights come on and stay on until the engine is shut off.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power brake system can cause the loss of hydraulic braking, leading to increased stopping distances, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: ABS and brake alarm lights come on and stay on until the engine is shut off.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of multiple components can lead to a loss of vehicle functionality, safety issues, and increased risk of accidents.
Excessive play in the steering column can cause loss of control, accidents, and increased risk of injury.
symptoms: Excessive play in the steering column

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Hard steering in cold weather can cause loss of control, accidents, and increased risk of injury.
symptoms: difficulty turning until the vehicle warms up.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden stalling of the engine at high speeds can lead to a loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The engine dies or stalls while driving at high speeds
and may be difficult to diagnose or reproduce.
